message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product that I believe would be highly valuable to you. I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000.  What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I believe it's a fair price considering the value I can get from the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but the value of this product to me is quite high. I could come down to $13,500, but that's as low as I can go. It's a win-win at that price, don't you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $13,500. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $13,000. Can we make a deal at that price?
